dir-section.heading: Banking
dir-section.p: In 2022 there were 26 banks operating in Slovakia.

org-entry.content-note: 32.5% owned by Bausparkasse Schwäbisch Hall AG (Germany); 32.5% owned by Raiffeisen Bausparkassen Holding GmbH (Austria); 25.0% owned by Erste Group Bank AG (Austria)

org-entry-head.alt-name: Burza Cenných Papierov v Bratislave, a.s.

org-entry.content-note: 99.6% owned by Allianz New Europe Holding GmbH
majority stake divested to Allianz AG (Germany) in 2002
name changed from Slovenská poisťovňa to Allianz—Slovenská Poisťovňa in 2003
known as ERGO Insurance Co until 2002

org-entry.found-date: 2008 by merger of Českej Poisťovne-Slovensko and Generali

org-entry.content-note: personal, car, property and liability, and travel

role-group.role: Gen. Man. for Slovakia and Czech Rep.
